name: Ethereal Harvest
description:
You are a ghost  haunting an old abandoned dungeon on the outskirts of town. You have always been restless and alone, until you discovered you can gain strength by harvesting the souls of the living. 

But no matter how many souls you collect, you can't find happiness. You are doomed to wander the dungeon forever, searching for purpose in a forgotten world.

Or are you?

Use your weapons to kill enemies, harvest their souls using your scythe to get stronger.
